description: '''Woodrow Charles Herman''' (May 16, 1913 â€“ October 29, 1987) was an American [[jazz]] clarinetist, saxophonist, singer, and [[big band]] leader. Leading groups called "The Herd", Herman came to prominence in the late 1930s and was active until his death in 1987. His bands often played music that was cutting edge and experimental; their recordings received numerous [[Grammy Award|Grammy]] nominations.
